repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:3.5 
MAINTAINER Dario Civallero <dario.civallero@gmail.com> 

ENV LANG C.UTF-8 
# Install software 
RUN apk add --no-cache --update ffmpeg gifsicle imagemagick bc

# mount /data 
WORKDIR /data 

# entry point script 
COPY entrypoint.sh /usr/local/bin/ 
RUN chmod +x /usr/local/bin/entrypoint.sh 
ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/local/bin/entrypoint.sh"]
